thread.title: Local authorities seek greater share of NHS winter funding
thread.title_full: Local authorities seek greater share of NHS winter funding

author: (Chloe Stothart)
title: Local authorities seek greater share of NHS winter funding
text:
Finance Your browser is no longer supported 
For the best possible experience using our website we recommend you upgrade to a newer version or another browser. Local authorities seek greater share of NHS winter funding 19 October, 2015 | By Chloe Stothart 
The Local Government Association is calling for councils to receive more money from the NHS to deal with delayed care transfers this winter. Figures show that councils received less than 6 per cent of ‘resilience’ funding last year.
